mapper.select: select orders.id,orders.userid,orders.menusum,orders.times,orders.delivery,users.name,users.phone,users.address,menus.name as menuname,menus.price1 from orders,users,menus where orders.userid=users.id and orders.menuid=menus.id and orders.times > #{0} and #{1} > orders.times
select count(*) from orders,users,menus where orders.userid=users.id and orders.menuid=menus.id
mapper.update: update orders set delivery=1 where id=#{id}
